titleInfo.title: American Letterpress at the Experience Music Project

mods.abstract: Five color window card (blue - green, red, yellow, navy and dark green on white) announcing American Letterpress: The Art of Hatch Show Print at the Experience Music Project and Science Fiction Museum and Hall of Fame on display from October 11, 2008 to July 16, 2009. Poster features woodcuts of a cartoon character and a rooster.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
